channel.title: Léa Seydoux on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Léa Seydoux on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘Silent Friend’ Review: Tony Leung and Léa Seydoux Share the Spotlight With Plants in a Rich and Strange Scientific Drama
item.description: Various species of trees and flowers are among the stars of Hungarian director Ildikó Enyedi’s unusual new feature, which premiered in competition in Venice.
